A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was absolute garbage of a story. The disrespect to Luke\, to Lucas\, to the star wars brand was revolting. It's to bad people are still going to see this. One thing I do know is you just killed your most die hard fans just to cater the casuals. Believe me when I say that star wars is just a faze and will pass. When it does not only did you lose your hardcore fans but you will lose your casuals too.
